name: Clover (Liero)
description:
Clover is a game where you explore a mysterious book. Each page will challenge you with a unique puzzle or riddle. Your objective (most of the time) is to work out and enter a password which will let you proceed to the next page. It is not an involved game and you can have it as something in the background.

The game contains 41 puzzles/riddles (excluding the secrets). Puzzle pages can also branch out giving your more information, or dividing a puzzle into a few steps.

The game is inspired by notpron and the gameplay is similar to an internet riddle. However, it provides easier navigation around the puzzles and introduces some interesting gimmicks along the way.

Clover has 3 background ambience options, but music is muted by default. You can turn it on in the options tab, but I recommend playing music you enjoy in the background. I've never made ambience before and I don't think any of my loops really fit the mysterious yet not serious mood.

Everything in this game was made by me (Liero) and it's my first project. It's a very unusual creation,  but I hope you are nerdy enough to enjoy it! ^^

Oh and if you have any feedback, or you caught any errors is my mediocre english, please let me know.
